title: Cap Streamer, mid-18th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, Brussels style
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Cap streamer of Point d'Angleterre à Réseau with a design of a serpentine garland and floral sprays. Streamer is outlined by a narrow border of larger droschel. Fond: droschel. Modes: portes, fond simple.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cap Streamer, mid-18th century.
mid-18th century. Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, Brussels style. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-121.
